com.jcabi.dynamo.retry

Class ReFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jcabi.dynamo.retry.ReFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Frame, Iterable<Item>, Collection<Item>

    @Immutable
@Loggable(value=1)
public final class ReFrame
extends Object
implements Frame
    Frame that retries on failure.
    Since:
    0.9
    Version:
    $Id: 10876cc74ecf48209aefb94a9198dc21a0be63e2 $
    Author:
    Yegor Bugayenko (yegor@tpc2.com)
